<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>

t=Math.imul;function n(e,t,n,r,a){var i=t+r>>>0,o=n+a>>>0;o>>>0<n>>>0&&(i=i+1|0),e[0]=i,e[1]=o}t||(t=function(e,t){var n=65535&e,r=65535&t;return n*r+((e>>>16&65535)*r+n*(t>>>16&65535)<<16>>>0)|0});e.prototype.next_=function(){var strict";__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);var _runner__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__=__webpack_require__(1),_experiment__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__=__webpack_require__(3);function _createForOfIteratorHelper(e,t){var n;if("undefined"==typeof Symbol||null==e[Symbol.iterator]){if(Array.isArray(e)||(n=_unsupportedIterableToArray(e))||t&&e&&"number"==typeof e.length){n&&(e=n);var r=0,a=function(){};return{s:a,n:function(){return r>=e.length?{done:!0}:{done:!1,value:e[r++]}},e:function(e){throw e},f:a}}throw new TypeError("Invalid attempt to iterate non-iterable instance.\nIn order to be iterable, non-array objects must have a [Symbol.iterator]() method.")}var i,o=!0,u=!1;return{s:function(){n=e[Symbol.iterator]()},n:function(){var e=n.next();return o=e.done,e},e:function(e){u=!0,i=e},f:function(){try{o||null==n.return||n.return()}finally{if(u)throw i}}}}function _unsupportedIterableToArray(e,t){if(e){if("string"==typeof e)return n=Object.prototype.toString.call(e).slice(8,-1);return"Object"===n&&e.constructor&&(n=e.constructor.name),"Map"===n||"Set"===n?Array.from(e):"Arguments"===n||/^(?:Ui|I)nt(?:8|16|32)(?:Clamped)?Array$/.test(n)?_arrayLikeToArray(e,t):void sanitizedRules(rules){if(null==rules)return[];var sanitized=[],_iterator=_createForOfIteratorHelper(rules),_step;try{for(_iterator.s();!(_step=_iterator.n()).done;){var         <script>
    var EM = EM || {};
    EM.translations = EM.translations || {};EM.translations["Jan."] = "Ian.";EM.translations["Feb."] = "Feb.";EM.translations["Mar."] = "Mar.";EM.translations["Apr."] = "Apr.";EM.translations["May."] = "Mai";EM.translations["Jun."] = "Iun.";EM.translations["Jul."] = "Iul.";EM.translations["Aug."] = "Aug.";EM.translations["Sept."] = "Sept.";EM.translations["Oct."] = "Oct.";EM.translations["Nov."] = "Nov.";EM.translations["Dec."] = "Dec.";</script>
<script>
    (function() {
        dataLayer.push({
            unique_token: String(Date.now()) + '' + (Math.floor(Math.random()*90000) + 10000)
        });
    })();
</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    window.EM = window.EM || {};
    window.EM.gtmUpdateTracking = function(data) {
        try {
            var result = {
                ecommerce: {
                    impressions: getImpressions(data.items),
                    search_category_recommendations: getVisualFilterTracking()
                },
                filter_click: data.trackedFilters
            };

            if (data.isDynamicallyLoaded) {
                result.event = 'listing_refresh';
                result.unique_token = String(Date.now()) + '' + (Math.floor(Math.random()*90000) + 10000);
            }

            if (data.category) {
                result.category_id = data.category.id;
                result.depId = data.category.department.id;
                result.listingCategory = data.category.trail;

                if (data.category.subdepartment) {
                    result.sdId = data.category.subdepartment.id;
                }
                if (data.category.department) {
                    result.depId = data.category.department.id;
                }
            } else if (data.items) {
                // finding department and subdepartment which have the most products on page
                // priority is given to subdepartment and the department it belongs to
                var frequency = {},
                    max = 0,
                    maxSubdepId,
                    maxDepId;
                data.items.forEach(function(item) {
                    var depId = item.category.department.id;
                    var subdepId = item.category.subdepartment.id;

                    frequency[subdepId] = frequency[subdepId] || 0;
                    frequency[subdepId]++;

                    if (frequency[subdepId] > max) {
                        max = frequency[subdepId];
                        maxSubdepId = subdepId;
                        maxDepId = depId;
                    }
                });

                result.sdId = maxSubdepId;
                result.depId = maxDepId;
            }

            if (data.conditions.filters.page_type === 'search' && data.searchQuery) {
                result['searched term'] = data.searchQuery;
            }

            var filters = [];
            var brandVendorWohoo = {
                brand: [],
                vendor: []
            };
            var i, l, filterId;
            for (var key in data.conditions.filters) {
                if (data.conditions.filters.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
                    if (
                        ['query', 'category', 'shop_id', 'page_type', 'department', 'subdepartment'].indexOf(key) !== -1
                        || /^tree_ref_\d+$/i.test(key)
                    ) {
                        continue;
                    } else if (key === 'custom_filter') {
                        for (filterId in data.conditions.filters[key]) {
                            if (data.conditions.filters[key].hasOwnProperty(filterId)) {
                                for (i = 0, l = data.conditions.filters[key][filterId].length; i < l; i++) {
                                    var optionId = data.conditions.filters[key][filterId][i];
                                    filters.push(data.filters[filterId].name + '_' + data.filters[filterId].items[optionId].name);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        if (key === 'brand' || key === 'vendor') {
                            if (key === 'brand') {
                                result.brand_id = data.conditions.filters[key];
                            }

                            // getting filter values for the special filters
                            var specialFilterData;
                            for (filterId in data.filters) {
                                if (data.filters.hasOwnProperty(filterId)) {
                                    if (data.filters[filterId].type === key) {
                                        specialFilterData = data.filters[filterId];
                                        break;
                                    }
                                }
                            }

                            if (specialFilterData) {
                                for (i = 0, l = data.conditions.filters[key].length; i < l; i++) {
                                    brandVendorWohoo[key].push(specialFilterData.items[data.conditions.filters[key][i]].name);
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            filters.push(key[0].toUpperCase() + key.slice(1) + '_' + data.conditions.filters[key]);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            result.pageType = EM.listingGlobals.pageType;
            result.pageType_google = (EM.listingGlobals.pageType === 'search' ? 'searchresults' : 'category');
            if (EM.listingGlobals.category && EM.listingGlobals.pageType === 'search') {
                result.search_category = EM.listingGlobals.category.name;
            }
            result.urlDivisions = {
                brand: brandVendorWohoo.brand,
                vendor: brandVendorWohoo.vendor,
                cleanurl: EM.listingGlobals.baseUrl.path,
                pr_no: EM.listingGlobals.resultsPerPage,
                pagination: EM.listingGlobals.currentPage,
                sort: EM.listingGlobals.sortOption ? (EM.listingGlobals.sortOption.id + ' ' + EM.listingGlobals.sortOption.direction) : '',
                filter: filters,
                shortTitle: EM.listingGlobals.shortTitle
            };

            if (data.isDynamicallyLoaded && window.google_tag_manager) {
                window.google_tag_manager["GTM-TKS335"].dataLayer.reset();
            }

            dataLayer.push(result);

            // If we don't have results and it's search
            if (!data.items.length && data.conditions.filters.page_type === 'search' && data.searchQuery) {
                dataLayer.push({event: 'gaEvent', ec: 'Search Results', ea: 'No Results', el: data.searchQuery});
            }
        } catch(ex) {
            dataLayer.push({event: 'gaEvent', ec: 'navigation_error', ea: 'dataLayer_tracking_error', el: ex});
        }
    };

    function getImpressions(items) {
        var impressions = [];

        for (var i = 0, l = items.length; i < l; i++) {
            impressions.push({
                id: items[i].offer.id,
                doc_id: items[i].id,
                category: items[i].category.trail,
                list: items[i].category.name,
                position: (i + 1),
                vendor_name: items[i].offer.vendor.name.default,
                product_name: items[i].name,
                status: items[i].offer.availability.text,
                scm_super_category: items[i].scm_super_category && items[i].scm_super_category.name,
                scm_super_category_id: items[i].scm_super_category && items[i].scm_super_category.id,
                offer_marking: items[i].offer.unified_badges ? items[i].offer.unified_badges.map(function(badge) { return badge.type; }) : null,
                category_id: items[i].category.id,
                subdepartment_id: items[i].category.subdepartment.id,
                department_id: items[i].category.department.id
            });
        }

        return impressions;
    }

    function getVisualFilterTracking() {
        let visualFiltersList = EM.listingGlobals.recommended_categories;
        if (!visualFiltersList) {
            return null;
        }

        return visualFiltersList.map(function(visualFilter, index) {
            return {
                position: index + 1,
                category_name: visualFilter.name,
                results_no: visualFilter.count,
                category_id: visualFilter.id
            };
        });
    }


    EM.listingGlobals = EM.listingGlobals || {};EM.listingGlobals.resultsPerPage = 60;EM.listingGlobals.currentPage = 1;EM.listingGlobals.sortOption = {
                    id: "score",
                    direction: "desc"
                };EM.listingGlobals.shortTitle = "Rezultate cautare";
    EM.listingGlobals.pageType = "search";
    EM.listingGlobals.baseUrl = {"path":"\/search\/hello+kitty+car+accessories","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"};
    EM.listingGlobals.conditions = {"filters":{"shop_id":1,"page_type":"search","query":"hello kitty car accessories"}};
    EM.listingGlobals.category = null;
    EM.listingGlobals.phrase = {"initial":{"string":"hello kitty car accessories","results_count":3,"url":{"path":"\/search\/hello+kitty+car+accessories","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"is_main":true,"words":[{"string":"hello","is_excluded":false,"url":{"path":"\/search\/hello","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"remove_url":{"path":"\/search\/kitty+car+accessories","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"}},{"string":"kitty","is_excluded":false,"url":{"path":"\/search\/kitty","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"remove_url":{"path":"\/search\/hello+car+accessories","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"}},{"string":"car","is_excluded":false,"url":{"path":"\/search\/car","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"remove_url":{"path":"\/search\/hello+kitty+accessories","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"}},{"string":"accessories","is_excluded":false,"url":{"path":"\/search\/accessories","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"},"remove_url":{"path":"\/search\/hello+kitty+car","desktop_base":"https:\/\/www.emag.ro","mobile_base":"https:\/\/m.emag.ro"}}]},"special":[]};
    EM.listingGlobals.section = "search";
    EM.listingGlobals.recommended_categories = ""

        <script>!function(){"use strict";var e=window.EM.cookie_policy.cookies.find(function(e){return"Google Doubleclick"===e.name});if(!e||!e.is_accepted){var t=Array.from(document.styleSheets).find(function(e){return"gpt-style2"===e.ownerNode.id});t&&(t.insertRule(".gpt-slot { display: none }",0),t.insertRule(".gpt-slot-nav-fallback { display: block !important }",0))}}(),function(){"use strict";window.googletag=window.googletag||{cmd:[]},googletag.cmd.push(function(){googletag.pubads().addEventListener("slotRenderEnded",function(e){var t=e.slot.getSlotElementId(),o=document.getElementById(t);if(o){var n=PH.closest(o,".gpt-slot");if(["category","label","resealed","search","subdepartment_catalog"].includes(EM.page_type)&&["tpb_product_main","RvBanner_CautareTop"].includes(t)&&n&&e.isEmpty)PH.addClass(n,"hide");else{if("subdepartment"===EM.page_type&&"tpb_subdepartments_top"===t&&n){if(e.isEmpty)return;var i=n.offsetHeight;n.nextElementSibling.style.cssText="transform: translateY("+i+"px); padding-bottom: "+i+"px",n.style.removeProperty("visibility")}if("nav-ad"===t&&e.isEmpty){var a=PH.q(".gpt-slot-nav-fallback");return a?void PH.removeClass(a,"hide"):void(n&&PH.addClass(n,"hide"))}if(!e.isEmpty){var s=PH.q("iframe",o);s&&PH.on(s,"load",function(e){e.target.style.minHeight="1px"})}}}})})}();</script>

                    	<span class="megamenu-list-department__department-name">Contul meu</span>
					</a>

Cosmetice</div><div class="megamenu-details-department-items"></div></div><div class="megamenu-details-department collapse-group" data-id="477"><div class="megamenu-details-department-title">Casa, Gradina &amp; Bricolaj</div><div class="megamenu-details-department-items"></div></div><div class="megamenu-details-department collapse-group" data-id="651"><div class="megamenu-details-department-title">Sport &amp; Activitati in aer liber</div><div class="megamenu-details-department-items"></div></div><div class="megamenu-details-department collapse-group" data-id="689"><div class="megamenu-details-department-title">Auto, Moto  &amp; RCA</div><div class="megamenu-details-department-items"></div></div><div class="megamenu-details-department collapse-group" data-id="768"><div class="megamenu-details-department-title">Jucarii, Copii &amp; Bebe</div><div class="megamenu-details-department-items"></div></div><div class="megamenu-details-department collapse-group" data-id="819"><div class="megamenu-details-department-title">Supermarket</div><div class="megamenu-details-department-items"></div></div></div></div></div>
    
    
    


<nav id="masthead" class="navbar navbar-main adjust-on-modal navbar-floating-fx navbar-minimized animate-navbar" data-navbar-fx-offset="0" data-navbar-minimized-offset="250">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="navbar-inner">
            <div class="navbar-branding"><div class="navbar-trigger"><a href="javascript: void(0)" class="btn main-megamenu-trigger" data-trigger="both" title="Trigger happiness"><i class="em em-burger megamenu-trigger-icon"></i></a></div>
                                <a class="navbar-brand" href="/" title="eMAG - Libertate în fiecare zi">
                    <img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/images/logo//59/88362.svg" alt="eMAG">
                </a>
            </div><div class="navbar-searchbox">
                    
<div class="searchbox-wrapper">
    <form action="/search" method="get" novalidate="true">
        <div class="input-group searchbox-input">
            <div class="form-control"><input type="text" id="searchboxAutocomplete" class="searchbox-suggestion js-searchbox-suggestion-input" autocomplete="off">
                <input type="search" id="searchboxTrigger" name="query" class="searchbox-main gtm_search_bar_click_search_week js-searchbox-input" placeholder="Ai libertatea să alegi ce vrei" value="hello kitty car accessories" autocomplete="off">
            </div>

<script>
(function() {
    if (!EM.is_logged_in) return;
    var a = document.querySelector('#my_account');
    a.setAttribute('href', '/user/myaccount?ref=ua_personal_data');
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        var i = a.querySelector('.navbar-icon');
        i.replaceWith(PH.node(EM.TMPL.exec('@Components/NavbarDropdowns/avatar.html.twig', {
            user_avatar: EM.user_avatar,
            has_club_membership: EM.user_data && EM.user_data.has_club_membership
        })));
    });
})();
</script>
        </div>
    </div>

        </div><div class="filter filter-default js-filter" data-filter-id="6427" data-choice-type="multiple" data-type="vendor" data-name="Livrat de" data-order="6" data-is-visible="1">

            <div class="collapse in" id="js-filter-6427-collapse" style="overflow-y: hidden;"><div class="filter-body js-scrollable"><a href="https://www.emag.ro/search/pret,intre-15-si-45/vendor/criflpie/hello+kitty+car+accessories?ref=lst_leftbar_6427_76051" class="js-filter-item filter-item" data-option-id="76051" data-name="Cri-flo Car Delivery Smd" data-option-order="1">Cri-flo Car Delivery Smd <span class="text-muted">(3)</span></a><a href="https://www.emag.ro/search/pret,intre-15-si-45/vendor/prtglyaw/hello+kitty+car+accessories?ref=lst_leftbar_6427_56027" class="js-filter-item filter-item" data-option-id="56027" data-name="Priti Global" data-option-order="2">Priti Global <span class="text-muted">(1)</span></a></div></div>
        </div><small class="pad-sep-xs mrg-sep-none visible-xs text-center text-muted">Sfarsitul listei de filtre</small>

    <div id="tpb_listing_skyscrapper"></div>

                </h2></div>

                <div class="card-body"><p class="product-stock-status text-availability-in_stock">în stoc</p><p class="product-vendor product-genius"><img src="https://s13emagst.akamaized.net/layout/ro/static-upload/genius-lite-logo.png" alt="eMAG Genius"></p></div><div class="card-body"><div class="pricing-old_preserve-space">
    <p class="product-old-price"><s>100<sup>00</sup> <span>Lei</span></s><span class="product-this-deal">(-62%)
                    </span></p>
            <p class="product-new-price">38<sup>00</sup> <span>Lei</span></p></div>
</div>

     (function(list){
         if (!list) return;
         var json = {
             "@context": "https://schema.org",
             "@type": "FAQPage",
             "mainEntity": [].reduce.call(list.querySelectorAll("li"), function(a, item){
                 var name = item.querySelector("h3");
                 var text = item.querySelector("p");
                 if (name && text) {
                     a.push({
                         "@type": "Question",
                         "name": name.textContent.replace(/\s+/g, " "),
                         "acceptedAnswer": {
                             "@type": "Answer",
                             "text": text.textContent.replace(/\s+/g, " ")
                         }
                     });
                 }
                 return a;
             }, [])
         };
         var script = document.createElement("script");
         script.setAttribute("type", "application/ld+json");
         script.textContent = JSON.stringify(json);
         document.head.appendChild(script);
     })(document.querySelector("#seo-f-a-q"));
    </script>

                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://anpc.ro/?ref=footer_3_5" class="footer-link" title="ANPC">ANPC</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://anpc.ro/categorie/1271/sal?ref=footer_3_6" class="footer-link" title="ANPC - SAL">ANPC - SAL</a></li>
                                                                                </ul>
                    </div>
                                                                                <div class="col-sm-3 js-footer-group">
                        <a href="#footer_services-4" class="ph-widget ph-collapse-one footer-head js-footer-head collapse-disabled" data-phino="CollapseOne" data-ph-target="#footer_services-4" tabindex="0">eMAG.ro</a>
                        <ul id="footer_services-4" class="footer-body collapse" style="overflow-y: hidden;">
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://marketplace-leads.emag.ro?utm_source=eMAG.ro&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=footer?ref=footer_4_1" class="footer-link" title="Vreau sa vand pe eMAG">Vreau sa vand pe eMAG</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/info/termeni-si-conditii?ref=footer_4_2" class="footer-link" title="Termene si conditii">Termene si conditii</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/info/prelucrarea-datelor-cu-caracter-personal?ref=footer_4_3" class="footer-link" title="Prelucrarea datelor cu caracter personal">Prelucrarea datelor cu caracter personal</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/info/politica-de-utilizare-cookie-uri?ref=footer_4_4" class="footer-link" title="Politica de utilizare Cookie-uri">Politica de utilizare Cookie-uri</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/main/index.cfm?event=main.home2.show&amp;lng=RO?ref=footer_4_5" class="footer-link" title="Solutionarea Online a litigiilor">Solutionarea Online a litigiilor</a></li>
                                                                                            <li class="footer-item"><a href="/guide/fundatia-emag?ref=footer_4_6" class="footer-link" title="Programele Fundatiei eMAG">Programele Fundatiei eMAG</a></li>
                                                                                </ul>
                    </div>
                                                                                </div>
    </div>
</div>
